
---
title: '荣耀 60 系列旗舰外观公布：渐变星空后盖，后置双圆环镜头'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/1d090f06-6675-450d-9e65-7f9bd4670eac.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1458'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Tue, 23 Nov 2021 00:46:25 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/1d090f06-6675-450d-9e65-7f9bd4670eac.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1458'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="b89f"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 11 月 23 日消息，荣耀将于 12 月 1 日 19:30 举办新品发布会，正式推出荣耀 60 系列手机。今日，<span class="accentTextColor">荣耀官方公布了该机的外观，由演员龚俊代言</span>。</p><p data-vmark="ae9b"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/1d090f06-6675-450d-9e65-7f9bd4670eac.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1458" w="1080" h="1920" title="荣耀 60 系列旗舰外观公布：渐变星空后盖，后置双圆环镜头" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/1d090f06-6675-450d-9e65-7f9bd4670eac.jpg 2x" width="1080" height="1458" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="ae09">从海报可以看到，荣耀 60 系列采用渐变 + 星钻的后盖设计，后置镜头为银色双圆环，中间还嵌有一个小镜头，机身侧边弯曲。</p><p data-vmark="355c"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/ba60cfa7-80c0-482a-bf08-f9f452f71dc2.png" w="1153" h="688" title="荣耀 60 系列旗舰外观公布：渐变星空后盖，后置双圆环镜头" width="1153" height="489" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7c2d">IT之家了解到，此前荣耀官方预热，荣耀 60 系列将采用星空主题设计，本次的宣传语为“美，放手去拍”，预计将<span class="accentTextColor">主打拍照功能</span>。</p><p data-vmark="d06c"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/54c69c65-4aaf-4c39-84a8-68a8a46ebd3b.png" title="荣耀 60 系列旗舰外观公布：渐变星空后盖，后置双圆环镜头" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="53b6">荣耀 60 系列已上架电商平台开启预约，暂未透露更多信息。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANkJK1olXDYCVV9cCEwVAW0MHF0lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXQEAVlxZD00IWipURmtRNXNdIlweWyhPeSd_H11gK1R2BCUtBEcnAGgBElwlXgQFVlhZDUgQMwxvdQZUWU1eDCYLOEkWBm4JE2tDMwYDVV9cCUofAmo4G1gSWQQHXF9VAHsXBG0OHFgcXgMBV1peOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsXM2w4RTUUDgAAVQ0KCCVNRTxdQQdWDWgCVVtdDE8UBGs4GVoUXwQy"
